Join Us in Charleston

Inviting hotel off I-26, near the airport and Charleston Convention Center

Welcome to Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Airport West, conveniently located off I-26 just three miles from Charleston International Airport (CHS) and nine miles from historic downtown Charleston. If you’re in town for an event, our hotel puts you minutes from Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center. You can also go shopping at the nearby Tanger Outlets Charleston or take the kids to Whirlin’ Waters Adventure Waterpark. Back at our pet-friendly hotel, enjoy free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking for vehicles of all sizes.

Fresh Amenities

Free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking round out your stay

Start your day off with a free light breakfast item together with your choice of coffee, tea and juice. Stay connected with free high-speed WiFi—perfect for planning out your itinerary—and make the most of free parking for vehicles of all sizes. Each of our comfortable guest rooms features a flat-screen HDTV, desk, hair dryer, and ironing amenities. You can also bring along your pet for an additional charge. While you’re here, our friendly front desk staff is happy to assist with anything you need, including directions and local recommendations.

Vibrant Surroundings

Discover a plantation, go golfing, or enjoy Southern eats

Explore the Southern charm and rich history of Charleston. Visit Magnolia Plantation & Gardens for a historic home, beautiful grounds, and boat tours; tee off at Shadowmoss Plantation Golf Club; or, simply enjoy a picnic at Park Circle. For shopping, head to the nearby Tanger Outlets or Northwoods Mall. You can also see exhibits at the North Charleston Fire Museum. In downtown Charleston, savor local eats at the historic Charleston City Market, stroll on the palm tree–lined path toward the Pineapple Fountain, or take in the pastel houses of Rainbow Row. For year-round concerts, sports, and special performances, get tickets to an event at North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center.

Join Us in Charleston

Inviting hotel off I-26, near the airport and Charleston Convention Center

Welcome to Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Airport West, conveniently located off I-26 just three miles from Charleston International Airport (CHS) and nine miles from historic downtown Charleston. If you’re in town for an event, our hotel puts you minutes from Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center. You can also go shopping at the nearby Tanger Outlets Charleston or take the kids to Whirlin’ Waters Adventure Waterpark. Back at our pet-friendly hotel, enjoy free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking for vehicles of all sizes.

Fresh Amenities

Free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking round out your stay

Start your day off with a free light breakfast item together with your choice of coffee, tea and juice. Stay connected with free high-speed WiFi—perfect for planning out your itinerary—and make the most of free parking for vehicles of all sizes. Each of our comfortable guest rooms features a flat-screen HDTV, desk, hair dryer, and ironing amenities. You can also bring along your pet for an additional charge. While you’re here, our friendly front desk staff is happy to assist with anything you need, including directions and local recommendations.

Vibrant Surroundings

Discover a plantation, go golfing, or enjoy Southern eats

Explore the Southern charm and rich history of Charleston. Visit Magnolia Plantation & Gardens for a historic home, beautiful grounds, and boat tours; tee off at Shadowmoss Plantation Golf Club; or, simply enjoy a picnic at Park Circle. For shopping, head to the nearby Tanger Outlets or Northwoods Mall. You can also see exhibits at the North Charleston Fire Museum. In downtown Charleston, savor local eats at the historic Charleston City Market, stroll on the palm tree–lined path toward the Pineapple Fountain, or take in the pastel houses of Rainbow Row. For year-round concerts, sports, and special performances, get tickets to an event at North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center.

Join Us in Charleston

Inviting hotel off I-26, near the airport and Charleston Convention Center

Welcome to Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Airport West, conveniently located off I-26 just three miles from Charleston International Airport (CHS) and nine miles from historic downtown Charleston. If you’re in town for an event, our hotel puts you minutes from Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center. You can also go shopping at the nearby Tanger Outlets Charleston or take the kids to Whirlin’ Waters Adventure Waterpark. Back at our pet-friendly hotel, enjoy free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking for vehicles of all sizes.

Fresh Amenities

Free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking round out your stay

Start your day off with a free light breakfast item together with your choice of coffee, tea and juice. Stay connected with free high-speed WiFi—perfect for planning out your itinerary—and make the most of free parking for vehicles of all sizes. Each of our comfortable guest rooms features a flat-screen HDTV, desk, hair dryer, and ironing amenities. You can also bring along your pet for an additional charge. While you’re here, our friendly front desk staff is happy to assist with anything you need, including directions and local recommendations.

Vibrant Surroundings

Discover a plantation, go golfing, or enjoy Southern eats

Explore the Southern charm and rich history of Charleston. Visit Magnolia Plantation & Gardens for a historic home, beautiful grounds, and boat tours; tee off at Shadowmoss Plantation Golf Club; or, simply enjoy a picnic at Park Circle. For shopping, head to the nearby Tanger Outlets or Northwoods Mall. You can also see exhibits at the North Charleston Fire Museum. In downtown Charleston, savor local eats at the historic Charleston City Market, stroll on the palm tree–lined path toward the Pineapple Fountain, or take in the pastel houses of Rainbow Row. For year-round concerts, sports, and special performances, get tickets to an event at North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center.

Join Us in Charleston

Inviting hotel off I-26, near the airport and Charleston Convention Center

Welcome to Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Charleston Airport West, conveniently located off I-26 just three miles from Charleston International Airport (CHS) and nine miles from historic downtown Charleston. If you’re in town for an event, our hotel puts you minutes from Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center. You can also go shopping at the nearby Tanger Outlets Charleston or take the kids to Whirlin’ Waters Adventure Waterpark. Back at our pet-friendly hotel, enjoy free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking for vehicles of all sizes.

Fresh Amenities

Free light breakfast, WiFi, and parking round out your stay

Start your day off with a free light breakfast item together with your choice of coffee, tea and juice. Stay connected with free high-speed WiFi—perfect for planning out your itinerary—and make the most of free parking for vehicles of all sizes. Each of our comfortable guest rooms features a flat-screen HDTV, desk, hair dryer, and ironing amenities. You can also bring along your pet for an additional charge. While you’re here, our friendly front desk staff is happy to assist with anything you need, including directions and local recommendations.

Vibrant Surroundings

Discover a plantation, go golfing, or enjoy Southern eats

Explore the Southern charm and rich history of Charleston. Visit Magnolia Plantation & Gardens for a historic home, beautiful grounds, and boat tours; tee off at Shadowmoss Plantation Golf Club; or, simply enjoy a picnic at Park Circle. For shopping, head to the nearby Tanger Outlets or Northwoods Mall. You can also see exhibits at the North Charleston Fire Museum. In downtown Charleston, savor local eats at the historic Charleston City Market, stroll on the palm tree–lined path toward the Pineapple Fountain, or take in the pastel houses of Rainbow Row. For year-round concerts, sports, and special performances, get tickets to an event at North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center.
